title: Spoon, "Metro", designed 1977–78
markings: On reverse of handle: "Supreme Cutlery; 18-8 JAPAN"; signature : "Ward Bennett Designs"
description: Oval bowl with straight-sided handle slightly domed, elongated oval central section and rounded terminal.

tombstone.epitaph:
Spoon, "Metro", designed 1977–78.
designed 1977–78. steel, stainless. Gift of Ward Bennett. 1986-53-12.
